name: promptmentor-extension
description: Chrome extension for adaptive help-seeking from LLMs

scripts.build: mkdir -p dist/content dist/popup && esbuild src/content/content.ts --bundle --outfile=dist/content/content.js --format=iife && esbuild src/popup/popup.ts --bundle --outfile=dist/popup/popup.js --format=iife && cp src/content/content.css dist/content/ && cp src/popup/popup.css dist/popup/ && cp src/popup/popup.html dist/popup/
